tweet: Everyday in every way I create my own reality. So what is that I choose to create today? - Gabriella Goddard #LOA
You see things; and you say: "Why?" But I dream things that never were; and I say: "Why not?" - GB Shaw
‘Don't judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds you plant’ RL Stevenson #LOA (better still don't judge!)
Limitations live only in our minds. If we use our imaginations our possibilities become limitless - Paolinetti #LOA
If you have zest and enthusiasm you attract zest and enthusiasm. Life does give back in kind. - Peale #quotes
